Plan Goal Steps Objectives Pre-req Goal This site is organized in chapters of random things that I am experimenting with. I would like to take rendom notes to log the journey so that I can come back to this for the shortcuts.
Steps I would create small scenarios that will help me learn each thing that will fit to a larger goal.
Objective Using Gitlab CI/CD to deploy Terraform Configurations in AWS Goal: Terraform - basic (module,variable,providor) GitLab Pipeline Resources: Terraform ci-cd Deploy Hugo with Terraform Pre-req Possible Idea what to build?
Possible Python app idea
Build the simplest website (static) Move that from static to API Next, with db Create terraform and deploy it to aws (manually) I need a aws account (creating new one) Just to keep these isolated let me create a new email account GitHub AWS Terraform Terrafrom TFSwitch Vault
